<div style="order:2;">{{{text|<translate><!--T:2--> '''Project:PD help''' is a project to create a set of concise user help pages for MediaWiki users, i.e. for visitors to a website which is powered by MediaWiki.</translate>
<translate><!--T:3--> The project covers all content in the Help [[<tvar name=1>Special:MyLanguage/namespaces</tvar>|namespace]].</translate>
<translate><!--T:4--> The main entry point for this is <tvar name=1>{{ll|Help:Contents}}</tvar>.</translate>

<translate><!--T:5--> This help documentation is separate from the [[<tvar name=1>Special:MyLanguage/Project:Manual</tvar>|Manual]] (the GFDL and CC BY-SA-licensed MediaWiki administrator's manual).</translate>
<translate><!--T:6--> Contributors, please be clear about the differences!</translate>
<translate><!--T:7--> The PD help pages do not contain information for server administrators, about how to install, configure, or maintain MediaWiki software.</translate>
<translate><!--T:8--> See the 'Goal' section below, for a detailed statement of what we are trying to achieve.</translate>}}}
